scripts.build: rimraf crates/app-main/pkg && rimraf crates/app-renderer/pkg && rimraf dist && npm run pack-app-main && npm run pack-app-renderer
scripts.pack-app-renderer-postprocess: cd crates/app-renderer && perl -pi -e "s/^\bimport\b { cpus/\/\/ import { cpus/g" pkg/activity_monitor_app_renderer.js
scripts.pack-app-renderer: npm run pack-app-renderer-build && npm run pack-app-renderer-postprocess && webpack --debug
